title: If He Wants It, He Has To Pay
itunes:title: If He Wants It, He Has To Pay
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I am a 37 year old single mom and I have been divorced since my child was three years old. My ex-husband did not contribute financially to me and our daughter in the years past because he had some health issues which kept him from working for a long period of time and he ended up moving in with his dad......................

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I am a 37 year old single mom and I have been divorced since my child was three years old. My ex-husband did not contribute financially to me and our daughter in the years past because he had some health issues which kept him from working for a long period of time and he ended up moving in with his dad......................
